Introduction
This topic contains information on providing notice of potential entitlement to REPS benefits, including information on
notifying dependents of potential REPS entitlement
, and
criteria for the automatic issuance of the forms
.
title: M21-1, Part XII, Subpart ii, Chapter 3, Section A - Overview of the Restored Entitlement Program for Survivors (REPS)
citation: Part XII, Subpart ii, Chapter 3, Section A
